name: multicellularity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of an organism consisting of more than one cell: Plants have evolved their multicellularity completely separately from animals.
More examplesFewer examplesOf course, the root cause of both cancer and stem cells is multicellularity.The advantages of multicellularity such as division of labour among differentiated cells occurred only later.Multicellularity might be an adaptive strategy for increased body size and protection against predators. Very little is known about the origin of multicellularity in Proteobacteria.Multicellularity makes specialization possible.
